name: マーベラスインタラクティブ
info:
• 简体中文名: 奇迹互动
  • 别名: ビクターインタラクティブソフトウェア
  • 别名: Victor Interactive Software
  • 别名: Marvelous Interactive
  • 别名: Maaberasuintarakutibu
detail:
Victor Interactive Software, Inc. was a Japanese video game software publisher and developer, established on August 3, 1970 as a division of Victor Entertainment.

On October 1, 1996, Victor Entertainment merged with Pack-In-Video Co., Ltd. to establish Victor Interactive Software.[1] On March 31, 2003, Victor Interactive Software was acquired by Marvelous Entertainment and became Marvelous Interactive,[2] which was merged into Marvelous Entertainment in June 2007.[3]

Popular series published by Victor Interactive Software include the Harvest Moon series and Keio Flying Squadron.
